title: New drug approvals hit a high note in 2020 but face uncertainty in 2021
author: Amirah Al Idrus
description: 2020 didn't match 2018's record-breaking performance in the new drug approvals department, but it came pretty darn close. | 2020 didn't match 2018's record-breaking performance in the new drug approvals department, but it came pretty darn close.
